pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Markey was speaking on ABC's This Week program.
sentences.chinese: 馬基是在美國廣播公司的“本週”節目中說這番話的。

sentences.english: Leahy also appeared on ABC's This Week.
sentences.chinese: 萊希也在美國廣播公司“本週”節目上接受採訪。

sentences.english: He appeared on the ABC television broadcast This Week.
sentences.chinese: 迪恩這個星期在美國廣播公司的節目中露面。

sentences.english: Hoekstra was interviewed on ABC's This Week.
sentences.chinese: 霍克斯特拉了美國廣播公司的“本週”節目採訪。

sentences.english: He remains frustrated by ABC's decision not to report the killing.
sentences.chinese: 他同樣對美國廣播公司決定不報道射殺事件感到泄氣。

sentences.english: A year telecine that appears for ABC ABC place.
sentences.chinese: 本片爲美國廣播公司ABC所呈現之年度電視電影。

sentences.english: ABC's John Quinones at Manuel Uribe's bedside.
sentences.chinese: 美國廣播公司記者在烏里韋的牀前對他進行採訪。
